page.title: 05Swallow Court_Pensioners
page.content: This is Mistertons only{sheltered {accomodation}for the elderly. When we went to {Swallow Court}.We interviewed the manager, Mrs Bradley and some of the old people. First of all we asked Mrs Bradley what she thought of the job.She said she enjoyed her job but it was very busy. The residents who can cook their own meals do so,but those who cannot,order {Meals on Wheels.}In every room there are alarms incase of fires.Every door although not actually fire proof, takes over an hour to burn through.The flats are for single people and the bungalows are for married couples.We then interviewed some of the residents.They said they liked living near the canal and liked to feed the ducks.They all seemed to enjoy living at Swallow Court but some did admit to missing their own homes.
